entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
